Plot: The story of two men, who met as apprentices in the Peking Opera, and stayed friends for over 50 years.
Title: Farewell My Concubine
Writer: Pik Wah Lee (novel), Pik Wah Lee (screenplay), Wei Lu
Actors: Leslie Cheung, Fengyi Zhang, Li Gong, Qi Lü
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 18 wins & 6 nominations.
